toggle_work.info: Toggles whether work will be shown

get_molar_mass.info: Returns molar mass of any chemical formula

get_element_info.example: Type a element and variable or 'all' Ex: Ar number

get_polyatomic_info.example: Type a polyatomic and variable or 'all' Ex: OH charge

unit_conversion.info: Converts given unit to given unit
unit_conversion.example: Type unit and formula, then desired unit Ex: 1.3mol NaCl -> g

get_sig_figs.info: Counts sig figs in given number

get_systematic_name.info: Returns systematic name of any given chemical formula

get_acid_name.info: Returns acidic name of any given chemical formula

get_chemical_formula.info: Returns chemical formula of any given systematic name
get_chemical_formula.example: Type systematic name Ex: Iron(III) Oxide

get_mass_percent.info: Returns mass percent of given element(s) in any chemical formula
get_mass_percent.example: Type elements/molecules in compound Ex: H2 O in H2O

balance_equation.example: Type chemical equation Ex: C5H12 + O2 -> CO2 + H2O
